animeTitle: Seiken Densetsu: Legend of Mana - The Teardrop Crystal
otherNames: Seiken Densetsu: Legend of Mana - The Teardrop Crystal
synopsis: Not far from the town of Domina lives Shiloh, a boy who keeps hearing a voice in his dreams about a mission he must fulfill. But what mission could he be needed for remains unknown. That all changes when he meets two Jumi, a race that’s hunted for their unique gemstones, as a sudden outbreak of attacks against the Jumi occurs. His dream, his quest, becomes clear—help the Jumi and their gemstones!
